title: High School Advanced Biology Language-Integrated Module Utilizing STEAM-Based Flash Animation

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level biology concept understanding, basic life science terminology mastery, scientific text literacy, and foundational writing skills
context.additional_context: A process applying biology concepts to creative problem-solving in self-directed learning and PBL environments using digital devices, fostering scientific communication and critical thinking skills.

learning_goals: Visualize the principles of cell division and genetic phenomena as flash animations through a STEAM approach and explain them using scientific vocabulary.
Analyze biotechnology case studies, reconstruct scientific concepts into creative media using animation tools, and strengthen logical expression skills.
Based on learned biology knowledge, present ethical judgments about real-life issues (e.g., gene-editing technology) using logical structures and specialized terminology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
